about_the_game:
Uncover A Mystical World!

In “Dreamkeeper” you play as Marshmallow, the cute little pet of a girl named Ava who wants to become a heroine. The so called “Dreamkeepers” are pets who have the magical ability to see nightmares and ward them off, while their owners are sleeping. But in Avas home village the Dreamkeepers are getting weaker and weaker and no one knows why. She embarks on a journey to find the cause of the problem and save her village. Help Marshmallow to fend off the nightmares and discover more about Avas world by increasing the score and unlocking more stories!


Choose Your Powers


By increasing the high-score you can unlock new tarot-cards with different abilities. There are five in total to choose from for every game you play, but you can only choose two in every fight to protect Ava from the Nightmares. Find your very own playstyle and explore the different card-synergies and modifiers to get the highest score!

Choose Your Challenge!

There are different game modes that offer the right challenge for every player, whether professional or beginner. After unlocking every card and lore-snippet you can customize your own game and choose modifiers to make the game harder or easier. Beat your own record and set new high scores by protecting Ava from all Nightmares!

In “Dreamkeeper” you play as Marshmallow, the cute little pet of a girl named Ava who wants to become a heroine. name: Dreamkeeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200U @ 2.50GHz (4 cores)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 M460
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: You play as Marshmallow, the cute little pet of a girl named Ava who wants to become a heroine and save her village from the Nightmares. To protect her you use magical bullets, tarot-cards and try to find your very own playstyle to unlock the story and get the highest score!
